comment: Dr. Golan provides a great work schedule. I did this class online so I could choose most of the assignments I wanted to complete. She gives you a lot of free reign when it comes to the video reflection notes and can be a lot of writing but if you find a video that you find interesting, it can be super easy. She is so sweet and wants you to pass.

The class was straightforward once in the rhythm of things. There is a weekly post and quiz, and then a couple of projects that you get to chose from. You don't have to take any exam if you choose other projects. There is quite the bit of writing to do for the class, but not too bad. Getting an A is fairly easy if you follow instructions.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--So many papers

comment: If you want to know what this class will detail, read the other comments- she has a pre-planned schedule that she follows. Great if you can allocate your time. Work might be tedious at times, but she's not a tough grader. I thought she was nice too. (:

Dr. Golan is very clear in what she expects from you. There are quizzes and discussions due every week however you only have to do 7 out of the 16 discussions provided for the semester. There are 16 quizzes as well but you only need 14 (2 are dropped). There's 3 four pg papers and 3 100 question tests throughout the semester.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Tough grader. Read the rubric for notes and projects and try not to slam your head against a wall. Will take off points if your notes are not the most creative ones she's ever seen. Not very accommodating or empathetic to struggles, but she is respectable to all beliefs and is probably kind otherwise.

She is very passionate about what she teaches but gives way too much work, this is not a filler class. Only take this class if you are actually interested or majoring in something like it. Super nice lady just has so much work. Lots of discussion posts, 3 4 page long essays based on the videos she provides and 3 100 question tests. (other options)

Awesome professor. quiz each week with 3 100 question tests spread throughout, all not lockdown. do 7/15 discussions, any more is EC. 3 video reflection notes due at the end, each 4 pages long. sounds like a lot but super easy to manage your time in this class. Super nice and responsive. Take this professor
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria

comment: This class was interesting. We had weekly textbook quizzes, and had to do 7 discussion posts for the semester. Also had to do 3 video note projects (usually took like 2 hours). Also could write 3 papers or take 3 one hundred question exams. Seems over whelming at first, but it really wasnt bad.

I had to take it for my Gen Ed classes but this class is lots of work so if you can't buckle down and focus, this may not be the teacher for you. The professor is great and seems likes she's very passionate but in my opinion she may be tooo passionate. All the assignments are extra and overwhelming! Only good thing is they offer flexibility.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: A little intimidating at first but there are 3 video responses, 3 tests OR projects, 7 discussions, and 15 quizzes throughout the semester. The class does fit well around your schedule. Unlimited attempts on quizzes. Read the textbook and stay up to date with assignments and you'll be fine. The smoothest online class I've ever taken, no hiccups!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read

comment: This class is a LOT of work. Do NOT take this course if you are looking for an easy A. Prepare to write long and detailed discussion posts weekly, three 5 page papers, and either take three exams with 100 questions each or write 3 more long papers.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Dr. Golan basically thinks that the students taking her class are only taking her class. The work load is UNREAL, and she grades harshly. This is my second degree I am obtaining, and she is the most overloading professor I have ever had. If you don't stay on top of this class EVERY DAY, you will not pass. And you have to read the book.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Prof Golan is very slow to respond to emails and grades harder than any 4000 level class I've taken. Redundant assignments which are graded too harshly for it being an intro class. I took it online on top of four other and definitely would not recommend. It's almost as if she thinks you're only taking her course. Also she doesn't hold office hours.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: I took this online class and it is an incredible and i mean incredible amount of work .  You have to do a long discussion every week with 2 long responses to peers.  I think it was for 14 weeks.  Also you have to watch 4 movies and write up 5 pages for each movie.  I'm not kidding.  You also have 4 tests that are nit picky or 4 tedious projects

Took the class online and she is a very nice professor.  She responds politely to all questions asked.  Unfortunately, you have to do 9 lengthy discussions with 2 responses to students.  They take a long time to compose as you have to site the book.  You also have to take a quiz every week and do either 3 projects or 3 test.  Very helpful teacher

Assignments galore.  They are not hard, but extremely time consuming.  You can't take this class with a full load.  I work twice as hard in this class as my other classes.  Each week, you have to take an online quiz and write 3 discussion posts.  Also, 3 tests are required or 3 tedious projects.  3 videos to watch with 5 page papers on each. Beware

So much work...like the work of 2 classes.  Discussion posting each week that she grades harshly.  You can choose to write a paper or take an exam, but she rips apart papers so look out.  Unless you work your tail off, you are not getting an A.  Take over the summer when you have hours of free time.
Don't take this class with a full load.  It is very demanding and requires you to write numerous mini-papers.  Way too much work for an introductory class.

Very tough class. A LOT of reading and a whole lot of discussion postings. You must complete a minimum of 10 discussion postings, and all the topics come straight from the book. You must also write 3 papers, which she grades VERY HARSHLY, BEWARE! The only thing that was good about the class was that you could take quizzes as many times as needed.

Professor Golan was really respectful of time and responded very quickly to email.  I took the same class that someone rated really poorly and my experience was that she was incredibly polite, so not sure what happened.  The class is NOT "easy" it takes a LOT of time and the discussions are like mini papers due each week.  Projects are cool though.

Professor Golan is great.  I took the online course and found it very challenging, however.  The "discussions" are more like little mini papers due each week.  It seemed to take a LOT of time-- more than a regular class.  The projects were great though.  VERY interesting and allowed the application of the book content.  Would definitely recommend.

Bad attitude, speaks poorly to student. Demeaning. The fact is you are in College for an education and your professor is suppose to create a decent learning environment. She is very demeaning and nasty. I would advise NOT to take her

Dr. Golan is a decent professor. I took her course online and she is very punctual in responding and also provides a detailed grading rubric for her assignments. Weekly posts and quizzes straight from the book. There were 4 video note journals and 3 papers. If you keep up with the assignments, you should make an A!

Online class. Quizzes are straight from the book that you can take as many times as you want before the due date. There are three "projects" and 5 "video notes". Weekly discussions and VERY strict on due dates. Easy A if you keep up with all the assignments!
Class has a ton of assignments and has a ton of online discussions! She does offer extra credit opportunities though and doesn't seem to be that tough on grading. Would most likely take her again.

Great Professor, makes class intresting and fun. Attendence is not mandatory but there are in class activities. Powerpoints are posted online after lecture. This was my first college class and I got an A.

She's quirky and fun to listen to as she does her powerpoints. Attendance is not necessarily required, but she does do surprise activities that count towards your grade. Her midterm and final are an easy pass so long as you study those reviews she gives you its impossible not to get an A or B. Online quizes are straight from the book.
Dr. Golan was funny and helpful on everything! She always answered emails in a timely manner. I had taken this class just as Gen. Ed., but I now find it very interesting!
my favorite class ever. shes amazing with her subject. she loves to teach with some humor. always on topic. just absolutely awesome
She is AWESOME!!!  The best teacher ever.  She really wants you to learn and makes it interesting.  The grade you want is totally up to you.  Go to class and you will get an A.  Love her.
Dr. Golan is awesome. She is such a great teacher and is super nice.
Maidie Golan aka carrot top is the****. like those fish tacos in i love you man not like ****.
Prof. Golan was great and interesting. Do the study guides and show up to class for activities for an easy A.

1 midterm & 1 final. Both are the exact questions from the study guide. All study guide answers come from ppts. Online quizzes are hard.Just take it a few times answering randomly and then use the old submissions to go through and find the answers until you make a good grade. Random class activies are done every week and those are your attendance.

Prof Golan is awesome! She makes class extremely entertaining and spells out exactly what she expects from the class. She posts study guides and her power point lectures which make studying for exams a breeze! She offers of extra credit, so there's no reason not to make a good grade in her class. All in all her class if fabulous! Take it!!
She is a GREAT teacher. I came in knowing absolutely nothing about anthropology and now I know lots of interesting facts. She makes learning interesting and fun!! TAKE HER!!!

You will want to go to EVERY class... Her powerpoints are worth it and she has a good sense of humor! Provides study guides for the Mid-Term and Final.  Uses VIEW Vista all the time, so make sure you have access to the internet.

TAKE HER! She provides easy extra credits but if you just come to class, sit in a chair and listen you'll actually be intrigued! Just do the online quizzes (EASY) show up to class when there are class activities and do the study guide and easy A! I got an easy A without doing any extra credit at all. Best prof. for the two years i've been in school

Returning to college after graduating 20 years ago, Professor Golan is my first class to start off the week.  She is a great Professor and she makes this class very interesting.  Online quizzes are due each week (25%)and you have three chances to take them. You have Midterm (25%)and final (25%)and in class activities(25%) so attend class.   Easy A.

This class is interesting already, but Dr. Golan's spin on the subject make it totally awesome. Her lectures are always both intriguing and full of excitement. There are online quizzes due usually every week, but they are pretty simple if you use the text. Also, there are in-class activities every once in awhile. I would highly recommend this class
Very good professor very hot and ready
none

Professor Golan ROCKS like the Cenozoic Era! [; She's wacky, unique, & creative---she really makes you interested in anthropology and her lectures are worthwhile & memorable because she does crazy stuff! [: She is SO much fun. Go to class-it's worth your time. Extra credit opportunities. Overall AMAZING PROFESSOR! Take her!

Professor Golan is amazing! She was my first professor of my college career and it was great. Had her in the morning and she was mad funny. Come to class because attendance is random. She's really easy and wants the class to be easy. She does not tolerate cheating so don't try it. I got an A in class...make sure that you do the online quizzes.

this chick can be fun for those who like charisma in their professor. The movies bored me. My only beef with her was that she was not willing to budge on a borderline grade (a 1 pt difference from one grade to the next). Lots of extra credit. everything is online.

She is AWESOME. Definitely one of the best professors and makes every class enjoyable. Quizzes- 20%, Attendance- 20%, Midterm-25%, Final-25%, and one project-10%. The quizzes require a lot of reading but the class is really fun and it is definitely possible to get an A if you put the work into it.
All you need to do for this class is show up, do the short online quizzes,take the multiple choice midterm and final(which she gives a study guide with the exact questions on it)and you will get a A.

FUNNIEST professor and really entertaining. she knows that lectures are boring so she tries to do the most odd things to keep you interested. her online quizzes are straight from the book, and her test come directly from her study guides. THIS CLASS IS CAKE! She is very knowledgeable about the subject, HIGHLY recommend!

She is funny and fun to listen to.  Her class is easy A if you show up for class. she does activities to show you were there.  She does not take Attendance but we had 250 in class.  Her study guides will get through her exams.

I agree with other posts-it is an animated class but too much animation has made me dislike it. Too laid back of an attitude for me to take any shred of this course seriously. Maybe because it is a gen ed class and because of that makes it so easy-almost like a protest against the department for making the curriculum so lame. She makes it fun tho.

She Became my favorite professor from the first day in her class. She is active and interesting... it's almost impossible to fall asleep in her class! I would go to her class even if I wasn't enrolled in it DEFINITLY TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!
She is probably the best professor i have had so anyone who is interested in anthropology at Kennesaw you should so take her class

Definitely an entertaining class.. Golan is crazy but funny. This class was so easy. The only grades you have are online quizzes that are straight from the book and you can take them all at the beginning of the semester, a midterm, and a final. she gives you the questions of the tests beforehand. I recommend.
She is crazy but in a good way.  She make this class something you will never forget.  She gives out every question to the midterm and the final.  Fun. Take Her.

i LOVED this class. this class was a getaway from the rest of the day for me. the class is very easy going and NEVER stressful like all my other classes. prof. golan is a little out there but it keeps me interested in her lectures
BEST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD!
She was very animated about the topic and the lecture was very interesting.
Prof. Golan can sometimes be a little spastic, but she's funny and her class is easy.  She's quick to answer any question you may have about grades or course objectives.

Huge lecture class, if youre looking for a more personal experience, this class is not for you! 25% participation, 25% online quizes, 25% midterm, 25% final. Powerpoints posted online--so attendance isnt mandatory. Everything you need is on the powerpoints. There should be no reason why anyone attending this class should not make an A.

Take this class. Maidie is the best teacher ever. She makes this otherwise boring topic very interesting. She is very comical but very educated. The one thing she wants you to take from the class is "Humans are not descended from monkeys". She has alot of pop quizzes in class so please make sure you show up.

She's funny, eccentric, and knowledgeable. Is very into visual and audio cues to drive the point home. Will embarrass herself for your enjoyment, and has convinced me to take her film class when I can.

Maidie isn't too bad. If you are open to ideas and how the world is all around you, take the class. If you are someone who is insecure and feel superiority, don't. She goes out of her way and even embarrasses herself to show everyone how everyone (pertaining to culture) is different. I personally enjoyed the class. She knows her stuff.

While I agree with many of the reviews she acts a bit out there to teach about social norms, she can get a bit irritating with it. Assignments for the most part are easy. She grades really tough on the Ethnographic project for this class, so don't slack or breeze through it. Midterm and Final questions are given out about a week before. She's ok!
Great professor. she made class so much fun. shes hilarious and makes the class exciting. its a really easy class. i recommend her.
Great teacher! Makes class exciting and understands what time means to college students.  You will definitely learn something.

She is very nice and very interested in Anthropolgy. Some of her assigned readings are really long, but just get the gist and a few facts. I would definitely take another class of hers. Showing up for class is encouraged and she appreciates it, but not a huge deal if you dont.

Highly recommended. Wouldn't go so far as to call her "crazy", since most of her "craziness" is inspired by course content & trying to make students aware of cultural & social norms and rules by breaking them. However, great class, interesting prof, refreshing for a 9:30am class. My only complaint is that her lectures are verbatim from the text.

This professor is Completely BoNkErS!But it was refreshing for a 930am class.You can tell she really enjoys teaching this class.She gives assignments online open book/no time requirement,suprise class activities,a straight forward study guide,and extra credit assignments!I missed a class activity worth 50pts.and still got an A in the class!TAKE HER

Believe what you want from everyone else has said. This teacher maybe easy but she is extremely rude and extremely disrespectful to her students!!!! I will probably go to the board for some of the things she has said to me and has said during class. If you want to be respected as a student, then dont take her!

TAKE HER!!! she is AWESOME! at first, i was mad because i couldnt get into psyc but i am so glad i took this class. she is the funniest teacher at ksu. i looked forward to going to her class. she is very easy and makes the some of the material interesting even when it clearly isn't. : ) she's the BEST!

She was really cool.  Good teacher, and tries to make class as fun as possible.  She realizes that anthropology is not many people's major, so she makes class fairly easy.  She is also attractive in a weird sort of way.  I don't know how to describe it.  I would suggest taking this class.
She knows what shes talking about! Very fun and hilarious power points. The lectures are long but interesting. Take her if you are interested in anthropology.

Primarily a lecture class due to its size. Her lectures were interesting & funny. Had to write 1 paper, do 2 online quizzes, and 1 group quiz. Study hard for the  2 tests! Book is not really necessary.

This teacher is pretty cool! I really didn't have any reason to go. But it ended up being a pretty easy class. Like... 6 assignments the entire semester and 2 of them are online quizzes! Lectures kinda boring but she's still entertaining. Easy A, take it! Good Stuff!

Nice woman, but a bit scatter brained for a professor.  Seems like she doesn't put her all into teaching, like using other professors outlines and assignments.  Pretty interactive in class.  Tests are pretty easy if you study the information.  Quizzes are easy if you scan over the chapter.  Requires a research paper and an ethnography report.

She can relate anything to anth.  I liked this class and missed it when it was over.  There is a lot of discussion that really makes you think. She is a great discussion facilitator.  She would make me laugh because her brain goes a million miles per sec and she would have trouble finishing a full thought sometimes

This class is really easy if you pay attention. people say this prof is scatter-brained, but it doesn't really impair her teaching: she is a great teacher; interesting, kind, and treats students more like peers. Tests are easy if you study and there are only like, 5- very very little homework. an awesome class.
